### enum class  {#a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>enum class anonymous_namespace&#123;SIMemoryLegalizer.cpp&#125;::SIAtomicAddrSpace </>}
 labels = {["strong"]}>
The distinct address spaces supported by the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> target for atomic memory operation.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95ab50339a10e1de285ac99d4c3990b8693" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NONE">
 (= 0u)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95a6eecfba72d12922ee1dead07a0ef3334" />
<EnumerationListItem name="GLOBAL">
 (= 1u &lt;&lt; 0)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95a4e8d3f5460164e12276c09537ffb5285" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LDS">
 (= 1u &lt;&lt; 1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95a445a0aadad9b9505d6277348cd05da2c" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SCRATCH">
 (= 1u &lt;&lt; 2)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95a495ebb08d96fd1ef02a05992b75a58e0" />
<EnumerationListItem name="GDS">
 (= 1u &lt;&lt; 3)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95a03570470bad94692ce93e32700d2e1cb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OTHER">
 (= 1u &lt;&lt; 4)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95af88a77e3d68d251c3dc4008c327b5a0c" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FLAT">
The address spaces that can be accessed by a FLAT instruction (= GLOBAL | LDS | SCRATCH)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95aef668eed93582ab6729f8a7e679d4f4a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ATOMIC">
The address spaces that support atomic instructions (= GLOBAL | LDS | SCRATCH | GDS)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95a5fb1f955b45e38e31789286a1790398d" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ALL">
All address spaces (= GLOBAL | LDS | SCRATCH | GDS | OTHER)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Can be ORed together.

### getFenceAddrSpaceMMRA() {#ac72a8ab7434610cedbfc589b9842483e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SIAtomicAddrSpace anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SIMemoryLegalizer.cpp&#125;::getFenceAddrSpaceMMRA (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="#a468bcaf55f58682520bae3261b54cc95">SIAtomicAddrSpace</a> Default)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Reads <code>MI&#39;s</code> MMRAs to parse the &quot;amdgpu-as&quot; MMRA.

If this tag isn&#39;t present, or if it has no meaningful values, returns <code>Default</code>. Otherwise returns all the address spaces concerned by the MMRA.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/simemorylegalizer-cpp/#l00722">722</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/simemorylegalizer-cpp">SIMemoryLegalizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
